languages.text: {n}Воплощение Имперской выносливости — ваш верный кибермастиф — напряженно замер рядом со входом в Яму. Глаза-люмены выцеливают вас, а в зубах зажат кусок чего-то странного. Встречаясь с вами взглядом, собака издает глухое "Гав!" и выплевывает свою находку на пол.{/n}

{n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Воплощение Имперской выносливости — ваш верный кибермастиф — напряженно замер рядом со входом в Яму. Глаза-люмены выцеливают вас, а в зубах зажат кусок чего-то странного. Встречаясь с вами взглядом, собака издает глухое "Гав!" и выплевывает свою находку на пол.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wie eine Verkörperung der imperialen Tugend der Ausdauer steht dein treuer Cyber-Mastiff angespannt und bewegungslos vor dem Eingang der Grube. Seine Lumen-Augen erfassen dich. Etwas Merkwürdiges steckt zwischen seinen Zähnen. Der Hund begegnet deinem Blick mit einem unterdrückten Bellen und spuckt seinen Fund aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie eine Verkörperung der imperialen Tugend der Ausdauer steht dein treuer Cyber-Mastiff angespannt und bewegungslos vor dem Eingang der Grube. Seine Lumen-Augen erfassen dich. Etwas Merkwürdiges steckt zwischen seinen Zähnen. Der Hund begegnet deinem Blick mit einem unterdrückten Bellen und spuckt seinen Fund aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Telle l'incarnation de l'endurance, votre fidèle cyber-mastiff se tient devant l'entrée de la Fosse, tendu et immobile. Il vous cherche de ses yeux à lumens en tenant dans sa gueule un morceau de quelque chose à l'aspect étrange. Le chien croise votre regard en poussant un aboiement étouffé et lâche sa trouvaille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Telle l'incarnation de l'endurance, votre fidèle cyber-mastiff se tient devant l'entrée de la Fosse, tendu et immobile. Il vous cherche de ses yeux à lumens en tenant dans sa gueule un morceau de quelque chose à l'aspect étrange. Le chien croise votre regard en poussant un aboiement étouffé et lâche sa trouvaille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你忠诚的生化獒犬，帝国美德的化身，此刻正一动不动地站在深渊的入口前。它眼睛上的流明灯盯着你，齿间咬着某种奇怪的东西。随后，它发出一声低沉的吠叫，迎着你的视线，吐出了嘴里的猎物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你忠诚的生化獒犬，帝国美德的化身，此刻正一动不动地站在深渊的入口前。它眼睛上的流明灯盯着你，齿间咬着某种奇怪的东西。随后，它发出一声低沉的吠叫，迎着你的视线，吐出了嘴里的猎物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu leal cibermastín, la personificación de la virtud imperial de la resistencia, se mantiene tenso e inmóvil frente a la entrada del Abismo. Entre los dientes aferra algo extraño. Al percatarse de tu mirada, el perro emite un ladrido ahogado y escupe lo que ha encontrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu leal cibermastín, la personificación de la virtud imperial de la resistencia, se mantiene tenso e inmóvil frente a la entrada del Abismo. Entre los dientes aferra algo extraño. Al percatarse de tu mirada, el perro emite un ladrido ahogado y escupe lo que ha encontrado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帝国の美徳「忍耐」の化身とも言える、あなたに忠実なサイバーマスチフは、深淵の入り口の前に緊張したまま微動だにせず立っている。その発光する目があなたを見つけた。口に何か奇妙なものをくわえているようだ。犬はあなたと目が合うとくぐもった声で吠え、くわえていたものを吐き出した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帝国の美徳「忍耐」の化身とも言える、あなたに忠実なサイバーマスチフは、深淵の入り口の前に緊張したまま微動だにせず立っている。その発光する目があなたを見つけた。口に何か奇妙なものをくわえているようだ。犬はあなたと目が合うとくぐもった声で吠え、くわえていたものを吐き出した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İmparatorluk'un sebat faziletinin vücut bulmuş hâli olan vefakâr siber mastifin, Çukur'un girişinde kaskatı durmuş bekliyor. Lümen gözleri seni arıyor. Dişlerinin arasında tuhaf görünümlü bir parça sıkıca kıstırılmış. Köpek, seni görünce boğukça havlıyor ve bulduğu cismi yere tükürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}An embodiment of the Imperium's virtue of endurance, your loyal cyber-mastiff is standing tense and motionless in front of the Pit's entrance. Its lumen eyes seek you out. A piece of something odd-looking is clenched between its teeth. The dog meets your eye with a muffled bark and spits out its find.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İmparatorluk'un sebat faziletinin vücut bulmuş hâli olan vefakâr siber mastifin, Çukur'un girişinde kaskatı durmuş beklemektedir. Lümen gözleri seni arar. Dişlerinin arasında tuhaf görünümlü bir parça sıkıca kıstırılmıştır. Köpek, seni görünce boğukça havlar ve bulduğu cismi yere tükürür.{/n}
